channel.title: Re: [cregox talk] [support/inbox] Pagination for shop page and pages width
channel.description:
[quote="outstyledonline@gmail.com"] Hi Caue
I’m not sure I understand, can you add pagination? If so, how would it function? Older/newer buttons? Numbered pages?
I have seen those answers before but do not know how to implement the code. I also don’t really know if it will work. Are you suggesting I add it myself?
Thanks, Cass [/quote]
